memories.name: Learning DevOps
memories.episode_body: Learning Kubernetes and Docker from Henry and Isabel. Want to become proficient in CI/CD automation and infrastructure management. Studying for AWS Solutions Architect certification.

memories.name: James Park - Associate DevOps Engineer
memories.episode_body: James Park is Associate DevOps Engineer on DevOps Team at TechFlow Solutions, reporting to Henry Brooks. Developing expertise in CI/CD pipelines, Docker containerization, and deployment automation. 1.5 years DevOps experience.

memories.name: Docker Image Optimization
memories.episode_body: Optimized Docker images for faster builds and smaller sizes. Techniques: multi-stage builds, layer caching, .dockerignore, minimal base images (Alpine). Payment service image reduced from 800MB to 250MB. Build time reduced from 5min to 2min with layer caching.
